answers.answer: Hi AshleyWe'll try to help you all we can.You said you can't eat much sugar.  Do you have diabetes?  If so, which type?Have you had your thyroid checked to make sure it's functioning properly?  Many of us with thyroid conditions find it very hard to lose weight.  You should be tested for TSH, Free T3 and Free T4 to make sure your thyroid is okay.Both diabetes and thyroid conditions can cause weight loss to be difficult, if not close to impossible.Other than that, maybe you aren't eating enough calories or doing enough exercise.  While dancing is great exercise, you probably need to do other types of exercise as well.

title: getting fit(loosing weight)
